post.body: OOH! tell me!! I want to live vicarously through you!!
HAHAHA!!! I LOVE Danny Cho!! lol. we did a gig @ Fordham together and still keep in touch.
very depressing indeed
i thought they looked hawt!
i guess as an asian woman, I'm overly aware of things like that, like Last Samurai....
how are the Minx ones holding up? well?
i LOVE them. have another appt on Saturday...
i love that book. it's literally like my bible.
lol - thanks girl!
i know Renee! We did a show together a few months back. did u do a track for her?
i totally agree. i love how her voice cracks at the last line. I remember it from Poetic Justice too!
i'm assuming it didn't go well with the contractor? nothing good comes easily, so keep your head up
LOL - i know, right?
hope so too
aww, MAN! bummer...
how was The Spirit? Been wanting to catch that one too....i'm a Sin City fan...
wow....ok. I'm sold. did you see 7 Pounds? I'm a bit skeptical about that one. didn't love Pursuit of Happyness much, but love Will
tweet tweet tweet tweet
LOL - i like that movie. maybe the last romantic comedy Eddy Norton will do....
really? you're making me want to see it - and I wasn't thinking of seeing it!
surprisingly, it wasn't as painful as I was anticipating! It was DEF what I needed to do...
it sure was. How was ur holiday??!
hm, ok. I think I'll try for then too!!
welcome back!!!!!!! Nails on Wed?? :)
I actually caught it in NBC. It was the martha Stewart episode.
lol - seems like everyone's headin up there this weekend....win big!
ew! me neither!! he looks like a fisherman...
yuck - which one?go to Intermezzo for some brunch fun tomorrow morning!
the thought of Gran Torino is intriguing, but seems like another "white man saves Asians and saves day" film...
great - my plans for tonight cancelled. what am I going to do to kill time tonight?
is thinking tonight, I need to bust out my Deepak Chopra. I need a few spiritual laws of success to make me feel better....
needs to move out of this phase, and move on to an empowerment phase. can I get an "amen!"?
Listening to Janet Jackson's "Again". The lyrics are killing me.
one day at a time: today is not a good day....
catching "Sleepless in Seattle". Ah, the days when Meg Ryan still looked pretty, pre "The Women" botox....
Ok, my twitter sabbatical was short-lived. Whatup my tweeple?! Had a great "me" day today: yoga, haircut and friends. :)
I'm going to disappear from the online world for a few days, so I can try and live in the real one for a bit. Bu-bye.
In a cab heading home. Dreaming of my scary yoga class tomorrow. Sigh....
is getting ready to head into the city....ah, the solitary life.
ok, top chef is not the show to watch when you're hungry...
